text:
View this post on Instagram
Can I please say it one more time so it can hit me that I have a game of thrones collaboration next year. Winter is coming. 🥶🤷🏽‍♀️
A post shared by Mufasa✨🌙 (@masabagupta) on Dec 17, 2018 at 8:02pm PST
title: Game Of Thrones Merchandise Designed By Masaba Gupta Is Coming To India Soon & Fans Can’t Keep Calm
description: Known for being quirky and playful with her designs, Masaba Gupta has bagged the deal to design official Game Of Thrones merchandise that will not only include apparels but also home products as well as jewellery inspired the cast of the epic American fantasy drama show.
